algorithm:
New Algorithm Description: The new algorithm scores the bins based on a combination of the rest capacities and the item-size ratio, adjusts the scores to ensure self-consistency, and then assigns bonus scores based on the number of items that can fit into each bin.

New Algorithm Code:

```
code:
import numpy as np

def score(item: int, bins: np.ndarray) -> np.ndarray:
    scaling_factor = 0.7
    
    # Calculate the item-size ratio
    size_ratio = item / bins

    # Calculate the rest capacity raised to the power of the scaling factor
    rest_capacities = bins ** scaling_factor

    # Calculate the adjusted scores based on a combination of the rest capacities and the item-size ratio
    adjusted_scores = rest_capacities * size_ratio

    # Normalize the adjusted scores to ensure self-consistency
    normalized_scores = adjusted_scores / np.sum(adjusted_scores)

    # Calculate the number of items that can fit into each bin
    num_items_fit = np.floor(bins / item)

    # Assign bonus scores based on the number of items that can fit into each bin
    bonus_scores = 1 / (num_items_fit + 1)

    # Normalize the bonus scores to ensure self-consistency
    normalized_bonus_scores = bonus_scores / np.sum(bonus_scores)

    # Combine the normalized scores and normalized bonus scores
    scores = normalized_scores + normalized_bonus_scores

    return scores
